Reviews.Title: Sony Cyer-shot DWC-W730 Camera
Reviews.Author: Patricia Peltier
Reviews.Content: This camera is great, it's so easy to use and light to handle. If need to call the company, they are very helpful and pleasant people to talk with. They make sure that your problem is handled before hanging up. This camera deserves 5 stars, if I could give it more I would.

Reviews.Title: great photos
Reviews.Author: Chepe
Reviews.Content: its my first digital camera and I love it! its simple and easy to use! great for starters! I use it for work and personal

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Ralph Edmonds
Reviews.Content: This camera has a lot of features that take more time than my P200.  The delay in focusing is lengthly and the time from picture taking until viewing is lengthly.  Certainly does not allow quick next shots.  Have not seen how the stabilization platform is doing anything.  The instruction manual received is not easy reading.  Difficult to pull up the REAL manual and retain quick information.This camera works fine on still shots especially on the tripod, but, does not do will when trying to take picture of a moving grandchild, animals, people in action, etc.Sure glad my p200 still works, especially when using flash.Do not consider the W730 as a good investment when trying to improve my picture taking ability.

ProductInfo.Features:
16.1 megapixel plus 8x optical zoom captures detailed subjects
Optical SteadyShot Image stabilization with 2-way active mode
Capture your videos in 720p HD Movie mode
Creative shooting with Picture and Beauty effects
Advanced Flash illuminates distant subjects for beautifully lit photos
ProductInfo.Name: SONY Cyber-shot DSC-W730 Compact Zoom Digital Camera in Silver + 16GB Secure Digital Memory Card + Sony Camera Case + Accessory Kit
